casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Maurice BEVERLEY Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 22, 2017 Laila M. G. Haswell, senior assistant public defender, in support of the petition. Nancy L. Walker, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 689 , 151 A.3d 854 (2016), is denied.
